channel.title: Scripting History
channel.description:
Hey ppl :)
I was just wondering if scripting has got harder now since runescape has more features/updates than a few years ago or is it easier to script since the cheating community is still running?
I miss the days of scripting.. :rolleyes:
[not sure if this is the right topic to post this in, maybe change to discussion?]

item.title: Scripting History
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It is hard to say.

If you write everything yourself and don’t use any includes like we did back in the day then it is most certainly harder, but if you use SRL which has everything done for you it is much easier than it used to be.

Read full topic

item.title: Scripting History
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

It’s the lack of people who want to learn to script is the thing that’s making it die imo.
They want the power to know it just given to them, and can’t be hassled to learn it.

Read full topic

item.title: Scripting History
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

Yes, every site (especially the [url=http://srl-forums.com/forum/]) has more recent scripts for SCAR I recommend going there. But now, there are more functions which can support the newer RuneScape which, believe it or not, make scripting more easier than previously

Read full topic

item.title: Scripting History
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Cheating is pretty much dead compared to what it was - at least on this site anyway.

Read full topic
